metadata.title: CVE-2023-6247 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The PKCS#7 parser in OpenVPN 3 Core Library versions through 3.8.3 did notproperly validate the parsed data, which would result in the applicationcrashing.

criterions.comment: openvpn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
